snippet: The Pentagon said it had confirmed that airstrikes Monday killed the leader of the Shabab, the Somalia militant network affiliated with Al Qaeda.
abstract: Pentagon announces that American airstrikes against the Shabab in Somalia have succeeded in killing Ahmed Abdi Godane, group's leader.

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER, ERIC SCHMITT and JEFFREY GETTLEMAN
byline.contributor: Helene Cooper reported from Newport, Jeffrey Gettleman from Maroantsetra, Madagascar, and Eric Schmitt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The Pentagon said it had confirmed that airstrikes Monday killed the leader of the Shabab, the Somalia militant network affiliated with Al Qaeda.

headline.main: Strikes Killed Militant Chief in Somalia, U.S. Reports
headline.print_headline: Strikes Killed Militant Chief in Somalia, U.S. Reports

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
